LanguageData.RawRice.label: rice
LanguageData.ZP_RawBrownRice.label: 玄米
LanguageData.ZP_RawBrownRice.description: 脱穀して籾を外すことで栄養価が高い玄米を食べることが出来る。
LanguageData.WhiteRice.label: White rice
LanguageData.WhiteRice.description: Rice that has been thoroughly threshed and polished.\nNutrients are lost in the process of polishing, but the taste improves superbly.
LanguageData.ZP_RawGlutinousRice.label: もち米
LanguageData.ZP_RawGlutinousRice.description: もちもちとした食感のお米。凍り餅の原料となる。
